definition:
For any player $i$, a strategy $s^*\in S_i$ *weakly dominates* another
strategy $s^\prime\in S_i$ if:
$$\forall s_{-i}\in S_{-i}\left[u_i(s^*,s_{-i})\geq u_i(s^\prime,s_{-i})\right]$$

(Remember that $S_{-i}$ represents the product of all strategy sets
other than $i$’s)

$s^*$ *strongly dominates* $s^\prime$ if:
$$\forall s_{-i}\in S_{-i}\left[u_i(s^*,s_{-i})> u_i(s^\prime,s_{-i})\right]$$
